title: Trophy & Achievement Guide
content:
plete Rescue the Tieflings. Complete Find Zevlor and forgive him.

Provided you helped the Nightsong, you should head to the Sorcerous Sundries, talk to Rolan. Tell Dame Aylin of Lorroakan's plans and fight him, Rolan should stand by your side. Defeating Lorroakan will result in Rolan taking over the Sorcerous Sundries.

The achievement will be awarded after beating the game, and not when the final requirement is met.
